title: Guy Mannering
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: He was born in the parish of Kirkmichael, about theyear 1671; and as he died at Kirkcudbright, 23rd November, 1792,he must then have been in the one hundred and twentieth year of hisage.

title: Guy Mannering, Or, the Astrologer - Complete
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: That potentate was himself deserving of notice from the followingpeculiarities:--He was born in the parish of Kirkmichael aboutthe year 1671; and, as he died at Kirkcudbright 23d November 1792,he must then have been in the one hundred and twentieth year ofhis age.

title: Black's picturesque tourist of Scotland.
snippet: From Pitlochrie there is a road through Glen Briarachan, Strathardle, and Kirkmichael, to Spittal of Glenshee and Castleton  of Braemar.

title: Guy Mannering /
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: He was born in the parish of Kirkmichael, about the year 1671 ; and as he died al Kirkcudbright 23d November, 1792, he must then have been in the one hundred and twentieth year of his age.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Proceeding towards the Lowlands by shortmarches, Mar paused at the small town of Kirkmichael, and afterwards at Mouline in Perthshire,moving slowly, that his friends might have leisureto assemble for his support.
